activities: We use the information to provide users with the products and services they request and to respond to questions related to such product and service offerings. We use the information to understand users use of our websites and to notify users about updates to one of our sites or to send users marketing materials or promotional offers that may be of interest to them. We may use this information in aggregate form to help us evaluate and modify existing services, and to help us develop additional services that are likely to be of interest to our users.
privacyprograms: BBBOnline Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Program
